"Rappy Assemblies":
"On rare occasions, when you defeat Dread Enemies in Exploration Sections, a large number of Rappies may appear.

You will know the Rappies have appeared by the sound of their song. Use it as a guide to find their gathering spot."
"In addition to regular Rappies, the gathering may be attended by special enemies like <yellow>Emperappy<c>."

"In Exploration Sections of each Region, defeating the Dread Enemies that spawn around a marker may cause a large number of Rappies to appear.

You will know the Rappies have appeared by the sound of their song. Use it as a guide to find their gathering spot."
